name: Blaze Man's Dimensional Adventure
description:
Follow Blaze Man and his trusty sidekick Gun Lad on a wild adventure that bends the laws of space and time as they quest for the most radical treasure of all: THE GOLDEN SHADES.

Credits:

Chief Violence Coordinator - Sumner Hensley

2nd Chief Violence Coordinator - John Zuzock

(Made for Global Game Jam 2022, Theme: Duality)
